blogPost.excerpt: A complete set of 4350 relaxed and comfortable icons. Plumpy style icons are modern with a bit of retro flair featuring heavily-rounded corners and a two-tone color style. • Modern two-tone colors • Friendly rounded styling • Scales and recolors well
blogPost.body: A complete set of 4350 relaxed and comfortable icons. Plumpy style icons are modern with a bit of retro flair featuring heavily-rounded corners and a two-tone color style. • Modern two-tone colors • Friendly rounded styling • Scales and recolors well
blogPost.title: Plumpy Icons - 4350 modern and friendly duotone icons by Icons8
blogPost.author: Ivan

localize.description: 一套完整的4350个轻松舒适的图标。Plumpy风格的图标是现代与一点复古的风格，具有重圆角和双色风格。- 现代的双色调颜色 - 友好的圆角造型 - 良好的缩放和重新着色能力。
localize.tagline: 4350个现代和友好的双色调图标由Icons8提供。

localize.description: 一套完整的4350個輕鬆舒適的圖標。Plumpy風格的圖標是現代與一點復古的風格，具有重圓角和雙色風格。- 現代的雙色調顏色 - 友好的圓角造型 - 良好的縮放和重新着色能力。
localize.tagline: 4350個現代和友好的雙色調圖標由Icons8提供。
